00019 PropertyDialog::PropertyDialog(QWidget* parent)
00020     : QDialog(parent)
00021 {
00022     setupUi(this);
00023     m_img = NULL;
00024 }
00025 
00026 void PropertyDialog::setImage(Image* img)
00027 {
00028     m_img = img;
00029 
00030     pathLabel->setText(m_img->filePath());
00031 
00032     dimensionLabel->setText( QString::number(m_img->width())
00033                              + "x"
00034                              + QString::number(m_img->height()) );
00035 
00036     Image* image = NULL;
00037     QString capacityText = "";
00038     foreach(ModuleInterface* module,
00039             ModuleManager::get(ModuleManager::IMAGEFORMAT))
00040     {
00041 
00042         image = ((FormatModuleInterface*)module)->encodeImage(m_img);
00043         long capacity = image->capacity();
00044         if(capacity!=0) capacity -= 4; // 4 octects for message length
00045         capacityText += "====== "+module->typeSupported()+" ======\n"+
00046                         QString::number(capacity)+" octects\n"+
00047                         QString::number(capacity/1024.0)+ " ko\n\n";
00048     }
00049 
00050     if(!capacityText.isEmpty())
00051         capacityLabel->setText(capacityText);
00052 }
